SUMMARY:
ALSA sound utilities
Command-line sound tester for ALSA sound card driver
Converts topology text files into binary format for kernel
Play (and record) sound files using ALSA
Command-line control for ALSA mixer and settings
ncurses-based control for ALSA mixer and settings
ALSA surround speaker test utility
Miscellaneous MIDI utilities for ALSA
ALSA sequencer connection manager
Network client/server for ALSA sequencer
ALSA utility for setting/showing IEC958 (S/PDIF) status bits
Saves/restores ALSA-settings in /etc/asound.state
Shows the events received at an ALSA sequencer port
ALSA PCM loopback utility
ALSA Use Case Manager
Shell scripts that show help info and create ALSA configuration files
